request.description: Send a captcha verification request to a member.
request.member: The member who should complete verification

common.guild_only: This command can only be used in a server.
common.wrong_guild: Please choose a member from this server.
common.is_bot: Bots do not require captcha verification.

sync.error: An unexpected error occurred while updating the captcha embed.
sync.updated: Captcha verification embed has been updated.
sync.missing_delivery: Captcha embed delivery is not configured for this server.

initiate.not_in_guild: This member is not part of a guild.
initiate.not_enabled: Captcha verification is not enabled for this server.
initiate.embed_success: Verification instructions posted in the configured channel.
initiate.dm_success: Verification message sent to the member.
initiate.failure: Unable to send verification instructions; please check the configuration.

embed.help_value: Click the button below to open the verification page.

embed_message.description: Click the button below to verify yourself. Once you pass the captcha, you will gain access to the rest of the server.
embed_message.login_notice: You may be asked to log in to the Moderator Bot dashboard first.
embed_message.title: Complete Captcha Verification
embed_message.footer: Guild ID: {guild_id} | Powered by Moderator Bot
